doc: An set of basic metrics measured by a withings scale
name: body

fields.name: stamp
fields.doc: A unix timestamp indicating the time at which the measurement was taken

fields.name: withingsId
fields.doc: The withings user account id associated with the collected metrics

fields.name: macaddress
fields.doc: The macaddress of the withings scale

fields.name: model
fields.doc: The withings model id for the device checking in

fields.name: batteryLevel
fields.doc: The current battery level as a percentage

fields.name: fatMass
fields.doc: The fat weight measured in grams

fields.name: waterMass
fields.doc: The water weight measured in grams

fields.name: boneMass
fields.doc: The bone weight measured in grams

fields.name: muscleMass
fields.doc: The muscle weight measured in grams
